main event: A civilian reported observing a yellow-orange object moving at a low rumbling sound for approximately 60 seconds in Bloomfield, Connecticut.
interesting points: The object was observed to be about 4-5 miles away,The sighting was made using ground-radar and air-visual methods,The sighting took place on 1 January 1960,The object emitted a low rumbling sound,The report is part of Project Blue Book efforts to document UFO sightings.
